/* Cus_Restrictions.xml - getForcedListCnt */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT listen.mem_no AS mem_no ,IFNULL(basic.mem_userid, basicx.mem_userid) AS mem_userid ,IFNULL(basic.mem_nick, basicx.mem_nick) AS mem_nick ,IFNULL(basic.mem_sex, basicx.mem_sex) AS mem_sex ,IFNULL(basic.mem_name, basicx.mem_name) AS mem_name ,IFNULL(basic.mem_birth_year, basicx.mem_birth_year) AS mem_birth_year ,IFNULL(basic.mem_birth_month, basicx.mem_birth_month) AS mem_birth_month ,IFNULL(basic.mem_birth_day, basicx.mem_birth_day) AS mem_birth_day ,IFNULL(basic.inner, basic.inner) AS `inner` ,((DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y') - (IFNULL(basic.mem_birth_year, basicx.mem_birth_year))) + 1) AS mem_age ,cstd.last_device_uuid AS device_uuid ,IFNULL(basic.mem_phone, basicx.mem_phone) AS mem_phone ,cst.ip AS mem_ip , dj_mem_no AS dj_mem_no ,IFNULL(dj.mem_userid, djx.mem_userid) AS dj_mem_userid ,IFNULL(dj.mem_nick, djx.mem_nick) AS dj_mem_nick ,IFNULL(dj.mem_sex, djx.mem_sex) AS dj_mem_sex ,IFNULL(dj.mem_name, djx.mem_name) AS dj_mem_name ,IFNULL(dj.mem_phone, djx.mem_phone) AS dj_mem_phone ,IFNULL(dj.inner, djx.inner) AS dj_inner ,cstd.ip AS dj_mem_ip ,cstd.last_device_uuid AS dj_device_uuid FROM rd_data.tb_member_broadcast_listening AS listen LEFT JOIN rd_data.tb_member_basic AS basic ON listen.mem_no = basic.mem_no LEFT JOIN rd_data.tb_member_basic AS dj ON listen.dj_mem_no = dj.mem_no LEFT JOIN rd_data.tb_member_basic AS basicx ON listen.mem_no = basicx.mem_no LEFT JOIN rd_data.tb_member_basic AS djx ON listen.dj_mem_no = djx.mem_no LEFT JOIN rd_data.tb_broadcast_room AS room ON listen.room_no = room.room_no LEFT JOIN rd_data.tb_member_connect_state AS cst ON listen.mem_no = cst.mem_no LEFT JOIN rd_data.tb_member_connect_state AS cstd ON listen.dj_mem_no = cstd.mem_no
listen.forced = 'Y'
AND listen.last_upd_date BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
GROUP BY listen.room_no, listen.mem_no ORDER BY listen.last_upd_date DESC ) AS a
